summary: Jai alai is a fast-paced sport that originated in the Basque region. Players use a wicker basket, called a cesta, to throw a ball against a wall. The name means "merry festival" in Basque. It's also known as cesta-punta. This sport is popular in Spain, France, Florida, and many Latin American countries. The playing area, called a fronton, is an open space with a wall for the ball to bounce off.
title: Jai alai
